/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the blend of modern and traditional styles that are characteristic of Beijing. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, the iconic landmark, the Great Wall of China, can be seen, adding a historical touch to the modern cityscape. The image is bathed in natural light, suggesting it was taken during the day.
